inclusion.criterion: Chronic Low back pain (pain for > 3 month)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any history related to spinal surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Low Back Pain due to specific pathology
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has chronic low back pain and no history of spinal surgery or epidural injections. However, he had a stroke which may be a contraindication to exercise.
